content: अवर्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Colourless, having no marks. {@--2@} Bad, low, destitute of good qualities. --र्णः {@--1@} Scandal, ill-repute, stigma, spot; सोढुं न तत्पूर्वमवर्णमीशे <ls>R. 14. 38.</ls> {@--2@} Blame, censure; न चावदद्भर्तुरवर्णमार्या <ls n="R. 14.">57</ls> spoke no ill words. {@--3@} Epithet of 18 letters according to थस्व, दीर्घ, प्लुत, उदात्त, अनुदात्त &c.
